statements: SELECT * FROM ad_clicks
SELECT id, user_id, ad_id, click_timestamp, is_fraudulent FROM ad_clicks
SELECT id, user_id FROM ad_clicks WHERE ad_id = 123
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC
SELECT id, user_id, is_fraudulent FROM ad_clicks WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE
SELECT ad_id, user_id, click_timestamp FROM ad_clicks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, ad_id, click_timestamp FROM ad_clicks WHERE is_fraudulent = true ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks WHERE is_fraudulent = false ORDER BY ad_id ASC, click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY ad_id HAVING total_clicks > 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM ad_clicks WHERE is_fraudulent = true GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT ad_id, click_amount FROM ad_clicks WHERE click_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, ad_id, impression_timestamp FROM ad_impressions ORDER BY impression_timestamp DESC;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS impression_count FROM ad_impressions GROUP BY ad_id HAVING impression_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks JOIN ad_impressions ON ad_clicks.ad_id = ad_impressions.ad_id WHERE ad_clicks.user_id = 456 AND ad_impressions.user_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks WHERE click_amount > 10 ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT ad_id, count(*) FROM ad_impressions GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(click_amount) FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(click_amount) > 100;
SELECT AVG(click_amount) FROM ad_clicks WHERE click_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks;
SELECT ad_id, click_timestamp, location FROM ad_clicks WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT activity_id, activity_description FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_id, location FROM ad_impressions WHERE impression_cost > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_impressions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, location, device_id FROM ad_clicks WHERE fraud_flag = true ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, location, click_timestamp FROM ad_clicks WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND fraud_flag = false;
SELECT ad_id, impression_cost, impression_timestamp FROM ad_impressions WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY impression_cost DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp, location FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_description LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT ad_id, impression_timestamp, location, impression_cost FROM ad_impressions WHERE impression_cost > 100.00 AND location NOT LIKE '%office%' ORDER BY impression_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM clicks;
SELECT user_id, ad_id FROM impressions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_name FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT detection_id, fraudulent FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraudulent = true;
SELECT click_id, impression_id, click_timestamp FROM clicks JOIN impressions ON clicks.click_id = impressions.click_id;
SELECT * FROM clicks WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT ad_id, click_timestamp FROM clicks ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM impressions WHERE user_id = 456 AND ad_id = 789;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(click_id) FROM clicks GROUP BY ad_id HAVING SUM(click_id) > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_name FROM ad_campaigns JOIN impressions ON ad_campaigns.ad_id = impressions.ad_id WHERE impression_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, click_timestamp FROM ad_clicks WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM ad_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, impression_timestamp FROM ad_impressions WHERE user_id = 123456;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, click_timestamp FROM ad_clicks WHERE user_id = 123 AND fraud_flag = FALSE ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM ad_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT log_timestamp, query_used, result_count FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-08-01' ORDER BY result_count DESC;
